comment: Trung Nguyen Legend Coffee World is a must-visit for coffee lovers in Ho Chi Minh City. The vibe is classy yet cozy, with rich coffee aromas filling the air. Their menu offers everything from strong Vietnamese brews to the famous Legendee ‚Ä¶

Trung Nguyen Legend Coffee World is a unique experience that blends the art of Vietnamese coffee with a touch of cultural spectacle. The space itself is impressive, with a grand scale and a focus on showcasing traditional Vietnamese ‚Ä¶

This is the place for vietnamese style coffee. We picked up some instant coffee mixes for gifts. The atmosphere is always nice in these stores and very spacious. The employees were very helpful in answering our questions and helping us select appropriate products.
One of the famous coffee in Vietnam,,.So glad that I visited the store..I bought 4kg of whole bean coffee and I pack of 3in1..good gifts to your friends if they love coffee..

Its a very nice cool environment especially on a hot sunny afternoon after walking around the Central Post Office, the Cathedral and the Book Street. I usually ordered the Legend Signature but tried the Peach Tea which is very refreshing.

Good smoothie and drinks, however the fried chicken banh mi was extremely basic (just lettuce and tomato slice, no pickled veggies etc). From the other reviews it looks like other food items are fine, just avoid the banh mi!

I had a terrible experience at this location. I've asked for a "Stewed tofu and mushroom with rice" but was told it was out of stock. Then I asked for "French fries", which the cashier turned to her colleagues and started laughing. I asked if it was out of stock also, she said no. It was such an unpleasant interaction. Why would it be on the menu?  Lastly, I ordered a "Legend coffee" and a "Fried rice with shredded chicken". There was a bug in my soup, which I've returned to the kitchen. The rice was also tasteless.  Disappointed experience, would not come back.

Friendly service, though slower than expected given it was relatively empty at the time.  Coffee is good but overpriced compared to other popular chains - guess ambiance, fancy utensils and decor cost $ üòåü§≠

I wish they would turn one sound source off.

Coffee was super smooth with very little bitterness and strong chocolate notes. Heaps of caffeine though. Tea smells like cigarettes. Service can be a bit slow especially for food.

We‚Äôre tourists in Vietnam and were asked to try Trung Ngyuen Legend Coffee. We ordered hot coffee and latte and it came so cold. What kind of hot latte is this cold and foamy? They should rename their hot latte as a cold cup of foam that is unnecessarily expensive.  It was 70% foam and cold milk, lukewarm at best. And when we tried to give feedback, the woman at the counter was extremely rude and didn‚Äôt even offer to fix it or give another one done right. Disappointed to say the least.  If you‚Äôre a tourist and want to try authentic Vietnamese coffee, go elsewhere. Highlands or Cong.

I tried the strongest coffee in the shop. I am not use to coffee but it taste great and I wanted to jump right out of the chair and run around.  Beautiful place and speak to the friendly staff to understand the history of Legend!

I visited Trung Nguyen Legend Coffee World (Th·∫ø Gi·ªõi C√† Ph√™ Trung Nguy√™n Legend). There is a sophisticated space that is irresistible for coffee lovers. The interior of the restaurant had a calm atmosphere, and the interior was a fusion of tradition and modernity. The staff was courteous and explained the characteristics of the coffee in detail when ordering.  In particular, Trung Nguyen Legend's signature blend is aromatic and has a deep flavor. The Vietnamese egg coffee and classic Vietnamese filter coffee were also delicious. There is a wide variety of beans available, and souvenir packages are also available.  This cafe is perfect for those who want to forget the hustle and bustle of the city and spend some relaxing time. This is a must-visit place for coffee lovers as you can experience the depth of Vietnamese coffee.
Delicious coffee, comfortable relaxing space. Enthusiastic and funny staff. There is a cafe meditation space. Thank you Mr. Vu for raising coffee to a new level.

Trung Yen Legend Coffee seems to be a well-known store in Vietnam. After the trip, I searched and found that it is a good variety of coffee beans produced by Trung Nguyen, a representative brand. The places I visited were the Notre Dame Cathedral and the Central Post Office in District 1 of Ho Chi Minh City, and the Trung Yen Legend Coffee World branch, which I happened to visit while walking down the street. The first impression of the store was a coffee shop where you can see drip coffee sets and various coffee accessories in a sophisticated and luxurious atmosphere suitable for the city center. I was able to taste Vietnamese coffee from Cafe Den (Vietnamese Americano), Cafe Ser (Vietnamese Cafe Latte), and Park Si-woo (Cafe Ser + Condensed Milk).

- Luxurious, clean, attentive and gentle staff, drinks (OK cafe), simple and frugal food (vegetarian). 5 stars ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è - Price is consistent with service quality. Higher than the average level of most users. Like üëç

The restaurant is right in the city center, near Notre Dame Cathedral. The space is spacious, airy, and beautifully decorated. Good coffee and water. It would be great if the staff limited the noise from washing cups and making drinks to create a quieter space.

Is a cultural space about coffee. Not modern but tells visitors every story about coffee. With spacious space divided into 2 areas. 1 common hall and 1 quite separate meditation space. When talking about coffee, we cannot help but mention Trung Nguyen. Is one of the largest coffee brands in Vietnam. Trung Nguyen will let you enjoy many types of coffee from strong to medium. Regarding the decor, it's great for customers to experience a spacious space that doesn't optimize seating but gives customers optimal experience. If you can, please stop by and experience it.
I went with my family on Tet holiday, the restaurant is big, beautiful, and the staff are enthusiastic. Good food, good drinks. Diverse types of unique coffee with the same name.

We passed by and saw a rather sophisticated and high-end sign so we went in to try it out. Drinking water prices are a bit high in my opinion, but the decoration and water quality are very ok. Very fragrant and not too sweet. The air conditioner is not too cold, just right. Suitable for young people taking virtual photos

The space is very beautiful, luxurious, classy, smooth. 2vc I came to sit early in the morning, I really liked it.. but the staff did not operate at the level of this space, either because the design of the mixing area made the sound inhibiting, very uncomfortable, or you were used to brandishing tools, opening and closing cabinet doors loudly all day, so I saw no problem?? We hope that similar stores, Trung Nguyen, can design the washing and blending area to be located in a small hidden compartment behind, which will greatly reduce noise.

The space is very cool, cool, and polite. The quality of the drinks is quite good. Cup of coconut coffee costs 119k but the crushed ice is lumpy. Employees come to ask for reviews directly from customers and also ask to take pictures of the reviews, which will make them feel awkward. I would like to give 4 stars with such a personal experience, I hope the shop develops better drink quality.

The restaurant's atmosphere is pleasant, relaxing music, and lovely staff. Large glass window view overlooking the green tamarind street, very chill and suitable for chatting happily with friends or meeting partners. Diverse menu, many delicious coffee dishes that no other shop has, for example Hemingway coffee ü•∞ There is food for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. I often stop by to eat on the way off work and sit down to read a book or make a date with friends. Sometimes I sit down and practice writing a few lines to relax my mood. There is spacious and convenient parking.
The food is good, I ordered dry Pho, the mixed water is delicious and the broth is normal. Coconut coffee is ok but there is too little coffee. The space is cool and clean.

Black coffee is expensive. It's fun to make it yourself, but it's overwhelmingly expensive in Vietnam.  WiFi üõú speed is standard, and the atmosphere is varied, including table seats and sofa seats, so you can stay for a long time.

Quiet, airy, clean space. The service staff is gentle, everything here is gentle like the word "Goodness". I really like the way you serve. The food is quite delicious, I ate grilled pork vermicelli and beef vermicelli quite ok. The drink is presented quite beautifully and is also very delicious.

This is one of the cafes that I like the most and go to most often, the space is luxurious, clean, polite, beautiful, the staff is extremely friendly and lovely, the drinks are delicious, especially the milk tea, Free parking, in general, it's a place I often visit because I like it.
I really like the space, suitable for sitting and working or meeting friends. I often drink coffee here because of the unique and different flavor. Enthusiastic staff, attentive to customers

Overall 2 stars because:  1. The restaurant is empty at the drink counter. I waited for a customer to choose her order. And I waited a long time. There was no one behind me waiting to order. The surrounding area of the shop is also deserted. The counter has 2 cash registers and 2 counter staff. But both employees were focused on the customer who was ordering and didn't know to tell me to go to the next machine to order water. Then I saw 2 very enthusiastic staff members standing and chatting with customers without being able to observe while I was waiting. Standing was tiring, so I sat and waited. Sit back and watch how interesting the conversation is 2. The new restaurant is spacious and beautiful. Suitable for meeting and chatting, not suitable for working with a laptop because the number of tables with power outlets is not many
